description: Whenever you cast the last charge of an [arcane] spell, your next non arcane spell is free for 1 turn.
name: Arcane Accounting

description: Whenever a unit is killed by arcane damage, that unit explodes for [12_arcane:arcane] damage in a [3_tile:radius] square, melting walls on effected tiles.
name: Arcane Combustion

description: Whenever you cast an [arcane] spell, if you have no shields, gain [1_SH:shields].
name: Arcane Shield

description:
Every 5 turns, if you have less than [2:num_summons] Bone Knights, summon a Bone Knight.
Bone knights are shielded melee units with a [dark] melee attack that drains max life.
name: Bone Guard

description:
Every 5 turns, summon a chaos chimera familiar if you do not currently have one.
The familiar has ranged [fire] and [lightning] attacks, and splits into a lightning snake and a fire lion on death.
The familiar can cast your Fireball, Lightning Bolt, Thunder Strike, Pyrostatic Pulse, Immolate, and Chaos Barrage spells on a 3 turn cooldown.
name: Chaos Familiar

description: Your [sorcery] spells gain [2_damage:damage] for each [frozen] or [glassified] unit.
name: Crystal Power

description:
Every 5 turns, summon a deathchill chimera familiar if you do not currently have one.
The familiar has ranged [ice] and [dark] attacks, and splits into a death snake and an ice lion on death.
The familiar can cast your Deathbolt, Icicle, Freeze, Iceball, Life Drain, Touch of Death, and Plague of Undeath spells on a 3 turn cooldown.
name: Deathchill Familiar

description:
Whenever you enter a new level, summon a Fae Stone nearby.
The Fae Stone is stationary and hard to kill, and has a [physical] melee attack.
Whenever you cast a [nature] spell, the Fae Stone heals for [10_HP:heal].
Whenever you cast an [arcane] spell, the Fae Stone teleports near the target and gains [1_SH:shields].
name: Faestone

description: Each turn all frozen enemies take [6_dark:dark] damage.
name: Frostbite

description: Whenever an enemy is [frozen], reduces that enemy's [physical] and [ice] resist by 100 until it is unfrozen.
name: Frozen Fragility

description:
When you cast three [arcane] spells in a row, regain a charge of a random [translocation] spell and summon [2_faeries:num_summons].
The faeries fly, blink, are shielded, can heal their allies, and have an [arcane] ranged attack.
The faeries vanish after [10_turns:minion_duration].
name: Glittering Dance

description:
Your living minions gain [75_ice:ice] resist.
Your living minions freeze for [3_turns:duration] upon taking ice damage.
Your living minions heal for [15_HP:heal] each turn while [frozen].
name: Hibernation

description:
Whenever a [frozen] enemy takes [holy] damage, you and all allies in line of sight gain [1_SH:shields], up to a max of [5:shields].
Whenever a [frozen] enemy is slain by [holy] damage, deal [17_holy:holy] damage to 3 random enemies in line of sight of the slain unit.
name: Holy Water

description:
Whenever you cast a [fire] spell, if you have less than [4:num_summons] hellhounds, summon a hellhound.
Hell hounds have a leap attack, fiery bodies which deal damage to melee attackers, and [fire] melee attacks.
name: Houndlord

description:
Your summoned [undead] units gain Hunger.
Hunger deals [7_dark:dark] damage to a target up to [3_tiles:range] away, healing the caster for all damage dealt, and has a [3_turn:cooldown] cooldown.
name: Hungry Dead

description:
Whenever you cast a [nature] or [lightning] spell, gain lifespark with duration equal to the spell's level.
Every turn you have active lifespark, summon a lightning bug swarm, which dissapears after 25 turns.
name: Lifespark Lantern

description: Whenever you cast a [lightning] spell, all non stationary enemy units within [3_tiles:radius] of the target are teleported to random spaces up to [5_tiles:range] away and take [9_lightning:lightning] damage.  Enemies will always be teleported atleast 4 tiles away from the wizard.
name: Lightning Warp

description: Poisoned enemies take [4:poison] additional [poison] damage each turn.
name: Megavenom

description: Whenever an enemy takes [fire] damage, it loses [10_physical:physical] resist.
name: Melting Armor

description: Each turn, heal each of your minions for [2_HP:heal]
name: Minion Regeneration

description: Whenever you cast a [nature] spell, you and all [living] allies heal [5_HP:heal].
name: Natural Healing

description: Your summoned units gain [25_physical:physical] resist, [25_lightning:lightning] resist, [25_ice:ice] resist and [25_fire:fire] resist.
name: Natural Vigour

description: Whenever an enemy takes [poison] damage, it has a 25% chance to be [stunned] for [1_turn:duration].
name: Paralyzing Venom

description: Whenever an enemy dies to [fire], [physical], or [lightning] damage, deal [13_damage:damage] of that type to a random enemy in line of sight of the target up to [5_tiles:radius] away.
name: Prince of Ruin

description: Whenever you cast an [ice] spell, [freeze] the nearest unfrozen enemy to that spell's target for [3_turns:duration].
name: Radiant Chill

description: Arcane minions you summon gain [3_SH:shields].  Other minions you summon gain [1_SH:shields].
name: Shielded Minions

description:
You are a [spider].
Passively spawn a web each turn on a random adjacent tile.  Webs will not spawn on top of units or walls.
Whenever you cast a translocation spell targeting a web, refund 1 charge of that spell and consume the web.
name: Silkshifter

description:
Whenever an enemy dies to [poison] damage, summon a friendly spider nearby.
Giant spiders have [14_HP:minion_health] and spin webs.
Giant spiders have a melee attack which deals [2_physical:physical] and inflicts [5_turns:duration] of [poison].
Webs [stun] non spider units which step on them for [1_turn:duration].
[Poisoned] units take 1 [poison] damage each turn and cannot heal.[Stunned] units cannot act.
name: Spider Spawning

description: Whenever you cast a translocation spell, summon a stormtroll trickster at the location you cast the spell from.
name: Stormbrood Tricksters

description:
Whenever a living ally takes damage, gain that much toadblood.
At 250 toadblood, summon a towering toadbeast near the most recently damaged ally.
Current toadblood: 0
name: Toadblood Transmutation

description:
Whenever you summon an [undead] or [demon], if you control a holy unit, the newly summoned unit gains [7_damage:damage].
Whenever you summon a [holy] creature, if you control an [undead] or [demon], the newly summoned unit gains [7_damage:damage].
name: Unholy Alliance

description:
Your summoned [living] and [nature] units gain Venom Spit.
Venom spit is a ranged attack which deals [4_poison:poison] damage and inflicts [poison] for [10_turns:duration].
Venom spit has a [6_tile:range] range, and a [4_turn:cooldown] cooldown.
name: Venom Spit

description:
Whenever you cast a [fire] or [arcane] spell, gain starcharged with duration equal to the spell's level.
Starcharged deals [6_fire:fire] damage to one random enemy in line of sight each turn, and [6_arcane:arcane] damage to another.
name: Voidflame Lantern

description:
Each turn, a random unacidified enemy is acidified.
Acidified units lose 100 [poison] resist.
name: Acid Fumes

description: Whenever you cast a [metallic] spell, a random summoned ally equips a copy of your armor
name: Armorer

description: For every 6 HP spent casting spells, summon a bloodghast for 13 turns.
name: Blood Anima

description: Whenever an enemy [demon] or [living] unit dies, gain 2 HP
name: Blood Reaping

description: Whenever you cast a [chaos] spell, you have a 25% chance of regaining a charge of another random [chaos] spell
name: Chaos Casting

description: Each turn, deal 2x the sum total of all [poison] damage dealt to all units to the nearest enemy as [dark] damage.
name: Collected Agony

description: Redeal half of all damage dealt to enemy units by [demon] allies as [poison] damage
name: Demonic Cruelty

description:
Whenever you cast a [nature] or [chaos] spell, send out tremors along the ground from the target to nearby enemies.
Each tremor deals [9_physical:physical] damage to the target and all units in its path.
The base number of tremors is equal to the level of the spell, but can be modified by num_targets bonuses.
The tremors can target enemies up to [8:radius] tiles away.
name: Earthwrath

description:
Redeal 50% of all [physical], [poison], [lightning], and [ice] damage dealt to enemies by [enchantments:enchantment] as [arcane] damage.
Redeal 50% of all other damage dealt to enemies by [enchantments:enchantment] as [poison] damage.
name: Fae Malevolence

description: Whenever an enemy takes [fire], it is then redealt half that damage [holy] damage.
name: Fiery Judgement

description:
Whenever an enemy takes [dark] damage and [fire] damage in the same turn, summon a burning ghost near that enemy.
Burning ghosts fly, have [100_fire:fire] resist and [100_dark:dark] resist, and passively blink.
Burning ghosts have a ranged attack which deals [7_fire:fire] damage with a [5_tile:minion_range] range.
The ghosts vanish after [10_turns:minion_duration].
name: Ghostfire

description: Whenever an allied unit heals, deal that much [poison] damage to up to [2:num_targets] enemy units in a [5_tile:radius] burst.
name: Hemocorruption

description: Whenever an enemy takes [lightning], it is then redealt half that damage [holy] damage.
name: Holy Thunder

description: Whenever an enemy dies to [dark] damage, up to [3:num_targets] random enemies in line of sight of that enemy are [stunned] for [5_turns:duration]
name: Horror

description:
Whenever you cast a [dark] spell, if your next spell is a [holy] spell of a lower level, that spell's cost is refunded.
Whenever you cast a [holy] spell, if your next spell is a [dark] spell of a lower level, that spell's cost is refunded.
name: Hypocrisy

description: You get +1 [lightning] damage for each undead ally you control.
name: Necrostatics

description: Whenever you or an allied unit deals physical damage to an enemy, if the source of that damage is shielded, redeal 50% of that damage as arcane and 50% of that damage as holy.
name: Purestrike

description: Whenever a summoned minion witnesses an enemy take [fire] damage, that minion heals for half that damage.
name: Pyrophilia

description: Whenever an enemy dies to [holy] damage, allies witnessing it gain [1_SH:shields] if they are not already shielded.
name: Righteous March

description:
At the end of your turn, if you control 10 or more [living] or [arcane] allies and no Egregore, summon a Scalefeather Egregore.
The Egregore can cast your blizzard, nightmare aura, devour mind, void beam, toxin burst, and lumbriogenesis spells if you have them.
The Egregore is unsummoned at the end of your turn if you control fewer than 10 living allies.
name: Scalefeather Egregore

description:
Whenever you cast a [fire] spell, deal [1_fire:fire] damage to all enemies in line of sight of the target.
This damage is fixed and cannot be modified.
name: Searing Heat

description: Whenever an enemy takes [fire], redeal half that damage as [arcane] damage.
name: Starfire

description:
Whenever you cast an [arcane] or [nature] spell, summon [3:num_summons] fae thorns near the target.
Fae Thorns have [10_HP:minion_health], and cannot move.
Fae Thorns have a melee attack which deals [4_physical:physical] damage.
The thorns vanish after [9_turns:minion_duration].
name: Thorn Garden

description: Whenever an enemy takes [holy] damage, it has a 50% chance to be [stunned] for [1_turn:duration].
name: Chastisement

description: Whenever an enemy takes [arcane] damage, deal that much [lightning] damage to up to [2:num_targets] enemy units in a [6_tile:radius] burst.
name: Cracklevoid

description: Whenever you cast the same [sorcery] spell twice in a row, gain a charge of that spell.
name: Echomancer

description:
Whenever you cast an [arcane] spell targeting a [frozen] unit, make a copy of that spell targeting each other frozen unit in line of sight.
Remove [frozen] from all affected units.
name: Ice Tap

description: Whenever one of your minions dies, up to [3:num_targets] random enemies in a [5_tile:radius] radius take [ice] damage equal to half the dead minion's max HP.
name: Icy Vengeance

description:
Whenever you cast a [fire] spell, all of your [metallic] allies gain [2_damage:damage] [fire] aura with radius equal to the level of the spell you cast for [10_turns:duration].
This damage is fixed, and cannot be increased using shrines, skills, or buffs.
name: Inferno Engines

description: Whenever you cast a [lightning] spell, your [lightning] spells and skills gain [4_damage:damage] for [6_turns:duration]
name: Lightning Frenzy

description: Whenever an enemy takes [arcane] damage, all [holy] minions in line of sight of that enemy redeal 50% of that damage as [holy] damage.
name: Moonspeaker

description: Whenever an allied [dragon] uses a breath weapon, all your summoned units gain 100 resist to that breath weapon's element for [5_turns:duration]
name: Scalespinner

description: Whenever a unit is unfrozen or a [frozen] unit is killed, up to [3_enemies:num_targets] in a [6_tile:radius] burst take [6_ice:ice] and [6_physical:physical] damage.
name: Shatter Shards

description:
Whenever a unit is unfrozen by fire damage, spawn [3:num_summons] steam elementals nearby.
Steam elementals have [16_HP:minion_health], [100_physical:physical] resist, [100_ice:ice] resist, and [100_fire:fire] resist.
Steam elementals have a ranged attack which deals [9_fire:fire] damage, with a range of [6_tiles:minion_range].
The elementals vanish after [5_turns:minion_duration].
name: Steam Anima

description:
Whenever [ice] or [lightning] damage is dealt to an enemy unit, create a blizzard or thundercloud nearby.
The blizzards deal [ice] damagage and may freeze enemies, the thunderclouds strike inconsistently but deal double [lightning] damage.
The clouds last [5_turns:duration].
name: Storm Caller

description: Each turn, if atleast 13 fire, lightning and physical damage were dealt to enemies, summon a Chaos Quill.
name: Chaos Poet

description:
For every 40 damage dealt by [sorcery] spells you cast, deal [1_physical:physical] damage to all enemy units.
This damage cannot be boosted.
name: Disintegrator

description: Whenever you cast a self targeted enchantment spell, a random minion also casts it.
name: Enchanters Boon

description: Whenever 200 damage is dealt by [blood] or [nature] spells, skills, or summons, summon a blood hound
name: Scent of Blood

description: Whenever you deal 6 or more fire, lightning, or physical damage, summon a corresponding snake for 4 turns.  The snakes attacks deal half the dealt damage.
name: Serpents of Chaos

description:
Whenever an enemy dies to [lightning] damage, another random enemy in line of sight of that enemy goes [berserk] for [5_turns:duration].
[Berserk] units are hostile to all other units, they will attack and be attacked by their allies.
name: Shock Value

description:
Whenever an enemy unit dies, each of your [dark] spells has a 10% chance of gaining a charge.
This chance is tripled if the unit died to [dark] damage.
name: Soul Harvest

description: Whenever you or one of your [arcane] or [undead] allies take damage from an enemy, deal [5_arcane:arcane] damage to the source of that damage.
name: Void Spikes
